item.title: YAUB Yet Another Useless Blog
item.description: Welcome to Yet Another Useless Blog Well we hope the articles here are not totally useless :) Who are we, you might ask. We (Thomas Jungbauer and Toni Schmidbauer) are two old IT guys, working in the business since more than 20 years. At the moment we are architects at Red Hat Austria, mainly responsible helping customers with OpenShift or Ansible architectures. The articles in this blog shall help to easily test and understand specific issues so they can be reproduced and tested.
